nodes.bodyText: How about remove the GlobalTransactionHookManager, and make it to other pr?
I think here keep it origin would be better.
Why getPrimaryKeyOnlyName() here will be orderd?

I still have some question here.

you do not sort the list, why call it 'ordered'?

2.If you just want to get the same order of field in 'undo sql' and 'undo prepare', I think the order of field would be same when you get it in different time.
How about remove this? And create a new pr to support H2 keyword checker?

You can not use
recognizer.getInsertColumns()

for key of the map from sqlRecognizer.
Because they come from users, they may look different from different time, for example the column name 'stock', it would like below
`stock`
stock
Stock
STOCK

The source of the column name is the same.
You will find out that they are coming from Tablemate if you track the invocation chain.
(a1 and b1) or ( a1 and b2 ) or (a2 and b2)  <=>  A in (a1,a2) and B in (b1,b2) ?
break， mysql can only have one auto-inc col
Is it in the wrong place?
remove guava dependency， cause  rm already add.
nodes.diffHunk:
